T02TD2455E:124b-3: shes rab kyi phrin yig ces bya ba /
T02TD2455E:124b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pha la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2455E:124b-5: rje btsun spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2455E:124b-6: de nyid gsum gyi rin chen rnam par dag gyur pa //
T02TD2455E:124b-7: gsang las shin tu gsang gyur mkha' dang mtshungs pa snang //
T02TD2455E:124b-8: lha mo kun 'gro bde ba mchog gi sa gzhir gyur //
T02TD2455E:124b-9: shes rab don dam gyur pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2455E:124b-10: sangs rgyas go 'phang grub don thob pa'i rgyur gyur cing //
T02TD2455E:124b-11: yid bzhin nor dang bum pa bzang po ltar snang ba //
T02TD2455E:124b-12: de yi shin tu gsang ba'i phrin yig mnyan 'os pa //
T02TD2455E:124b-13: de nyid don gyi go 'phang bshad byar spring bar bya //
T02TD2455E:124b-14: de nas sgrub po la phan phyir //
T02TD2455E:124b-15: shes rab phrin yig pad rdo rjes //
T02TD2455E:124b-16: gsang las shin tu gsang gyur pa //
T02TD2455E:124b-17: de kho na nyid rab gsal bya //
T02TD2455E:124b-18: sva sti dag pa kun grol ba //
T02TD2455E:124b-19: nam mkha' lta bur skye ba med //
T02TD2455E:124b-20: rang rig tsam gyi shes bya dang //
T02TD2455E:124b-21: mchog tu dga' ba byed pa mo //
T02TD2455E:124b-22: mtshan ma med cing snang ba med //
T02TD2455E:124b-23: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
T02TD2455E:124b-24: chos dbyings rang bzhin zhes bya ba //
T02TD2455E:124b-25: mchog tu dri ma med pa'i gnas //
T02TD2455E:124b-26: mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs //
T02TD2455E:124b-27: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD2455E:124b-28: bdag med dri ma med pa'i gzhi //
T02TD2455E:124b-29: rdo rje gsum byung dri ma med //
T02TD2455E:125a-2: yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung //
T02TD2455E:125a-3: lha yi dpag bsam shing lta bu //
T02TD2455E:125a-4: mchod pa mchog gi gnas gyur pa //
T02TD2455E:125a-5: de na gnas pa'i lha mo des //
T02TD2455E:125a-6: shes rab lha mo bla na med //
T02TD2455E:125a-7: rdor gsum mi phyed sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2455E:125a-8: de kho na nyid padmar ldan //
T02TD2455E:125a-9: nang gi gnas kyi rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2455E:125a-10: mchog tu dga' ba byed pa la //
T02TD2455E:125a-11: dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2455E:125a-12: 'bad de yang dag mkhyen par gsol //
T02TD2455E:125a-13: rba rlabs med cing snang ba med //
T02TD2455E:125a-14: rang gi lus la gnas gyur kyang //
T02TD2455E:125a-15: 'bar ba chen mo de srid kyi //
T02TD2455E:125a-16: dus gsum bdag gis ma shes so //
T02TD2455E:125a-17: mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can ma //
T02TD2455E:125a-18: rang bzhin med pas mdzes pa ste //
T02TD2455E:125a-19: skye ba med pas kun rtogs pas //
T02TD2455E:125a-20: thams cad du ni khyab byed ma //
T02TD2455E:125a-21: 'dod pa yon tan bzang sngar ldan //
T02TD2455E:125a-22: lus dang lus la kun du gnas //
T02TD2455E:125a-23: dmyal ba la sogs thams cad la //
T02TD2455E:125a-24: gsang ba'i spyod pas rol pa ste //
T02TD2455E:125a-25: mdog dang yan lag rnam par spangs //
T02TD2455E:125a-26: gsang las shin tu gsang gyur 'di //
T02TD2455E:125a-27: dpal ldan bde chen zhal snga yi //
T02TD2455E:125a-28: bka' drin gyis ni bdag gis rtogs //
T02TD2455E:125a-29: dri ma med cing khyab pa mo //
T02TD2455E:125a-30: rang rig mtshan nyid gcig bu ste //
T02TD2455E:125a-31: skye ba med la rtogs bya'i phyir //
T02TD2455E:125a-32: ji bzhin du ni rnam par gnas //
T02TD2455E:125a-33: dngos dang dngos med mchog 'dzin pa //
T02TD2455E:125a-34: zad par bya phyir ji bzhin gnas //
T02TD2455E:125a-35: bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis //
T02TD2455E:125a-36: dge ma ji bzhin shes nas ni //
T02TD2455E:125a-37: yang da gus dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD2455E:125a-38: nus pa ji bzhin bsgom pa'ang byas //
T02TD2455E:125a-39: de ltar na yang da bar du //
T02TD2455E:125a-40: gcig tu mi 'gro ci yi phyir //
T02TD2455E:125a-41: yang na bdag la skal med dam //
T02TD2455E:125a-42: ji ste bdag gi sems rgyud la //
T02TD2455E:125a-43: yang dag pa yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2455E:125a-44: ji skad gsungs bzhin mi gnas sam //
T02TD2455E:125a-45: rang gi rang bzhin gyis dag pa //
T02TD2455E:125a-46: mngon par byang chub byed pa mo //
T02TD2455E:125a-47: phung lnga rdo rje gsum sogs la //
T02TD2455E:125a-48: ji bzhin yang dag gnas pa ni //
T02TD2455E:125a-49: slob dpon dpal ldan zhal snga nas //
T02TD2455E:125a-50: snying rjer zhugs pa'i thugs kyis ni //
T02TD2455E:125a-51: 'bad de de bzhin rtogs bya'i phyir //
T02TD2455E:125a-52: yang dag ji bzhin bdag la gsungs //
T02TD2455E:125b-0: dpal ldan bde chen @125b mgon po yis //
T02TD2455E:125b-1: khyod kyis dngos la bdag blo bskyed //
T02TD2455E:125b-2: bka' lung stsal cing gnas pas na //
T02TD2455E:125b-3: de la 'dir ni the tshom med //
T02TD2455E:125b-4: de nyid gsal bar shes nas su //
T02TD2455E:125b-5: nyin dang mtshan du bsgom byas kyang //
T02TD2455E:125b-6: gang phyir bden par gsal ba ru //
T02TD2455E:125b-7: mi snang bas te stong ngam ci //
T02TD2455E:125b-8: yid bzhin nor bu mkha' mtshungs pas //
T02TD2455E:125b-9: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs so lo //
T02TD2455E:125b-10: de ltar gsungs pa'i tshig de dag / bden pa dang ni mi bden yin //
T02TD2455E:125b-11: mkha' mtshungs gang yin bden pa ste //
T02TD2455E:125b-12: gang zhig shes nas bsgom gyur kyang //
T02TD2455E:125b-13: gang dngos gsal bar mi ston pas //
T02TD2455E:125b-14: yid bzhin nor mtshungs brdzun pa yin //
T02TD2455E:125b-15: bdag gis khyod ni don dam gyis //
T02TD2455E:125b-16: kun du 'char bar shes pa ste //
T02TD2455E:125b-17: de ltar na yang mi dmigs pas //
T02TD2455E:125b-18: sgyu ma tshogs kyi gzugs 'dzin yin //
T02TD2455E:125b-19: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis don dam du //
T02TD2455E:125b-20: nges par skyon dang yon tan dag / grogs 'dus pa las ji bzhin 'gyur //
T02TD2455E:125b-21: gsungs pa'i ngag de bden pa ste //
T02TD2455E:125b-22: shes rab bden par smra ba khyod //
T02TD2455E:125b-23: gang gis rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yang //
T02TD2455E:125b-24: bdag med bzhi yang 'dus pa yis //
T02TD2455E:125b-25: de dang mtshungs par de gnas so //
T02TD2455E:125b-26: bzang mo dri ma med 'bar ma //
T02TD2455E:125b-27: 'on kyang gang gis bdag shes nas //
T02TD2455E:125b-28: yun ring dus su rnam dpyad kyang //
T02TD2455E:125b-29: ma dmigs pa de gang du yib //
T02TD2455E:125b-30: mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'i gzugs //
T02TD2455E:125b-31: mngon par byang chub byed ba'o //
T02TD2455E:125b-32: ye shes sgron ma'i snang ba ni //
T02TD2455E:125b-33: phyogs bcur gsal bar bteg nas su //
T02TD2455E:125b-34: dri dang phreng sogs na bza' dang /
T02TD2455E:125b-35: bza' bca' ston mo de bzhin gzhan //
T02TD2455E:125b-36: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2455E:125b-37: rgyun mi 'chad par rtag tu ni //
T02TD2455E:125b-38: bdag gi shes rab bsten gyur kyang //
T02TD2455E:125b-39: skad cig kyang ni 'gyur ba med //
T02TD2455E:125b-41: de bzhin nyid shes dag pa yi //
T02TD2455E:125b-42: khyod kyi dam tshig spyod pas ni ;
T02TD2455E:125b-43: / byang chub lam ni ston pa po //
T02TD2455E:125b-44: rgyud las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin //
T02TD2455E:125b-45: rgyun du bar chad med par ni //
T02TD2455E:125b-46: 'dod yon lnga po bsten pa yis //
T02TD2455E:125b-47: bdag gi byis pa nas bzung ste //
T02TD2455E:125b-48: shin tu bdag nyid rig pa yis //
T02TD2455E:125b-49: bsten pa dang ni bsgoms gyur pas //
T02TD2455E:125b-50: dge ba yi ni sa gzhi khyod //
T02TD2455E:126a-0: @126a * // bdag la ci phyir yid mi rton //
T02TD2455E:126a-1: sems gnyis ldan pa'i bud med la //
T02TD2455E:126a-2: su zhig la ni rton byed ces //
T02TD2455E:126a-3: yang dag mgon pos gsungs ba gang //
T02TD2455E:126a-4: de ni bden par nye bar gnas //
T02TD2455E:126a-5: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad la //
T02TD2455E:126a-6: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
T02TD2455E:126a-7: rnam pa du mas phan btags pas //
T02TD2455E:126a-8: gang gis rnam kun bsten byas shing //
T02TD2455E:126a-9: khams gsum ma lus bar bltas kyang //
T02TD2455E:126a-10: mi snang gcig pu ga na gnas //
T02TD2455E:126a-11: khyod kyis gnad ni dran med par //
T02TD2455E:126a-12: byis pa gang gis khyod bsgoms na //
T02TD2455E:126a-13: de rnams don med phung 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2455E:126a-14: byang chub rgyur khyod gnas pa min //
T02TD2455E:126a-15: gnad ni legs par shes ldan pa //
T02TD2455E:126a-16: gang gis khyod ni bsgoms gyur na //
T02TD2455E:126a-17: byang chub snying bo'i bar du yang //
T02TD2455E:126a-18: de rnams sangs rgyas bya phyir gnas //
T02TD2455E:126a-19: bzang mo khyod dngos shes gyur nas //
T02TD2455E:126a-20: gang gis ma bsgoms de la yang //
T02TD2455E:126a-21: grogs mos lag pa bsdams te song //
T02TD2455E:126a-22: rigs ngan dang ni mtho ba'ang rung /
T02TD2455E:126a-23: gnad shes nas ni mdzar gyur nas //
T02TD2455E:126a-24: bzang mo nang du'ang snang byed cing //
T02TD2455E:126a-25: lan 'ga' 'ang mdza' ba'i ngo med cing //
T02TD2455E:126a-26: ma rabs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2455E:126a-27: mtshang brtol na ni nges pa ru //
T02TD2455E:126a-28: skye bo de yi gdong gi ni //
T02TD2455E:126a-30: cho 'brang can gyi skye bo yang //
T02TD2455E:126a-32: tshig tsam chad pa byas na yang //
T02TD2455E:126a-34: gnyi ga dag pa'i rigs las byung //
T02TD2455E:126a-35: cho 'brang can du skyes pa yin //
T02TD2455E:126a-36: bya ba dang ni bya min dang //
T02TD2455E:126a-37: snod dang snod min 'dir khyad med //
T02TD2455E:126a-38: khyed la bdag gis rnam kun du //
T02TD2455E:126a-39: mchod byas lan 'ga' nga mi lta bas //
T02TD2455E:126a-40: shes rab khyod kyi rigs spyod yul //
T02TD2455E:126a-41: da ltar bdag gis khong du chud //
T02TD2455E:126a-42: bud med rnams kyi rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2455E:126a-43: shin tu 'phyar la g-yo ba yin //
T02TD2455E:126a-44: mchu rkan la sogs skam pa ste //
T02TD2455E:126a-45: mtshang 'dru mang bos ci zhig bya //
T02TD2455E:126a-46: khyod ni nyin dang mtshan dag dang //
T02TD2455E:126a-47: skad cig gcig kyang ma yengs par //
T02TD2455E:126a-48: sgo man skad cig nyid kyis ni //
T02TD2455E:126a-49: bla na med pa'i gnas thob byed //
T02TD2455E:126a-50: gang gis nye bar bsgoms pa yis //
T02TD2455E:126a-51: sangs rgyas go 'phang rgyu yin pa'i //
T02TD2455E:126a-52: khyod kyi spyod pa 'di lta bu //
T02TD2455E:126b-0: ji skad @126b gsungs pa zhin sngar ma shes //
T02TD2455E:126b-1: mang po smra ba ci zhig dgos //
T02TD2455E:126b-2: yid brtan rung ba 'ga' yang med //
T02TD2455E:126b-3: 'gyod dang gnyid dang rmugs pa yis //
T02TD2455E:126b-4: rmongs pas khyod ni mi shes na //
T02TD2455E:126b-5: khyod kyi rang gi rang bzhin gang //
T02TD2455E:126b-6: gsal ba ru ni de smros shig / rdor gsum sa bon las byung bas //
T02TD2455E:126b-7: gsum gyis bskyed par the tshom med //
T02TD2455E:126b-8: 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs dri mas //
T02TD2455E:126b-9: sems can thams cad rmongs pas na //
T02TD2455E:126b-10: bye ba du ma'i nang nas kyang //
T02TD2455E:126b-11: gang gis khyod shes su yang med //
T02TD2455E:126b-12: mang du smra ba ci zhig dgos //
T02TD2455E:126b-13: smang 'tshong g-yon can gyis bskor bzhin //
T02TD2455E:126b-14: don dam du ni grub med pas //
T02TD2455E:126b-15: sgyu ma mchog gi gzugs 'dzin ma //
T02TD2455E:126b-16: bskal pa bye ba grangs med par //
T02TD2455E:126b-17: rmongs pa khyod ni ma shes te //
T02TD2455E:126b-18: bza' dang btung sogs chags pa yis //
T02TD2455E:126b-19: srid pa'i brtson rar lhung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2455E:126b-20: de la shin tu chags pa yis //
T02TD2455E:126b-22: phyag rgya'i chags la 'jug pa yis //
T02TD2455E:126b-23: rgyal 'gyur rdo rje can mchog ma //
T02TD2455E:126b-24: bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin las //
T02TD2455E:126b-25: bzang mo khyod kyi rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2455E:126b-26: ji ltar yang dag gnas pa bzhin //
T02TD2455E:126b-27: thams cad bdag gis shes par 'gyur //
T02TD2455E:126b-28: khyod kyi rang bzhin ma lus pa //
T02TD2455E:126b-29: thams cad bdag gis shes pas na /
T02TD2455E:126b-30: rmi lam na yang slu mi nus //
T02TD2455E:126b-31: de bas bdag la blo gtod cig / khyod kyi lam ni gcig pu nyid //
T02TD2455E:126b-32: mkhas pas cho ga bzhin sbyangs te //
T02TD2455E:126b-33: gang bzhugs sangs rgyas nyid phrad par //
T02TD2455E:126b-34: rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bstan //
T02TD2455E:126b-35: zab mo de yang bdag gis ni //
T02TD2455E:126b-36: ji srid spyang ba ma byas pa //
T02TD2455E:126b-37: de srid khyod kyi lus reg las //
T02TD2455E:126b-38: byung ba'i bde ba rnyed ma yin //
T02TD2455E:126b-40: zhe sdang gis ni sdong dum ldang //
T02TD2455E:126b-41: 'dod chags tsher ma nyam da bas //
T02TD2455E:126b-42: byang chub lam ni bgod bar dka' //
T02TD2455E:126b-43: phung po'i shing ni thog mtha' med //
T02TD2455E:126b-45: nam mkha'i mthong ni g-yogs pas na //
T02TD2455E:126b-46: lam de dam por bkag ste gnas //
T02TD2455E:126b-47: phung po nyon mongs de bzhin du //
T02TD2455E:126b-48: 'chi bdag lha bdud chom po pa //
T02TD2455E:127a-2: rnam rtog chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD2455E:127a-3: srid pa'i rtsva dang lcug ma dang //
T02TD2455E:127a-4: rdo rgyal la sogs ldan pa'i nags //
T02TD2455E:127a-5: shin tu rgya chen rgal dka' bar //
T02TD2455E:127a-6: phung po'i shir rta brten nas su //
T02TD2455E:127a-7: gti mug 'obs ni rgal dkar gnas //
T02TD2455E:127a-8: kun rtog rtsa dang ldum sogs pa'i //
T02TD2455E:127a-9: skyibs su 'bad de yib par byed //
T02TD2455E:127a-10: lha bdud la sogs chom po pa //
T02TD2455E:127a-11: de lta bu yi phyogs na gnas //
T02TD2455E:127a-12: yang dag lam zhugs 'gron po dag / sems kyi nor bu 'phrog pa yis //
T02TD2455E:127a-13: rab tu sdang bas 'joms par byed //
T02TD2455E:127a-14: dkon mchog gsum gyi mdzod po che //
T02TD2455E:127a-15: yon tan nor gyis yongs bkang pa //
T02TD2455E:127a-16: byang chub lam la gnas pa yi //
T02TD2455E:127a-17: mel tshe ba yis de mthong nas //
T02TD2455E:127a-18: ye shes rdo rje sta re ni //
T02TD2455E:127a-19: so ni rnon por bdar ba yis //
T02TD2455E:127a-20: byang chub kyi ni lam 'gog pa'i //
T02TD2455E:127a-21: phung po shing ni kun bcad nas //
T02TD2455E:127a-22: cho ga bzhin du gtubs nas su //
T02TD2455E:127a-23: yid kyi shing de las byung ba'i //
T02TD2455E:127a-24: nyon mongs ldum dum tsher mar bcas //
T02TD2455E:127a-25: bdag med me la bsreg par bya //
T02TD2455E:127a-26: nga rgyal rdo yi tshogs de ni //
T02TD2455E:127a-27: shes rab rdo rje phye mar bya //
T02TD2455E:127a-28: gti mug 'obs ni 'khrigs pa dag / byang sems rgyun mi 'chad bas dag / yang dag lam zhugs 'gron po la //
T02TD2455E:127a-30: 'chi bdag bdung sogs chom po pa //
T02TD2455E:127a-32: byang chub lam ni yangs pa na //
T02TD2455E:127a-33: byang chub 'gegs bya'i phyir gnas pa //
T02TD2455E:127a-34: phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sdang ba rnams //
T02TD2455E:127a-35: thabs kyi lus ni dri med pas //
T02TD2455E:127a-36: shes rab ral gri rnon po yis //
T02TD2455E:127a-37: 'bad pas de dag bcom nas su //
T02TD2455E:127a-38: lam bzang de ru zhugs nas ni //
T02TD2455E:127a-39: thams cad der ni ci dgar 'gro //
T02TD2455E:127a-40: byang chub lam ni sbyangs pa yis //
T02TD2455E:127a-41: kun du shin tu dri med pas //
T02TD2455E:127a-42: rmad byung bsam gyis mi khyab ba'i //
T02TD2455E:127a-43: grogs mo khyod ni sbyangs pas na //
T02TD2455E:127a-44: rang bzhin dri med dag cing zhi //
T02TD2455E:127a-45: rang rig bdag med mnyam pa nyid //
T02TD2455E:127a-48: khyod kyi rang bzhin ro myang na //
T02TD2455E:127a-50: sangs rgyas kyis kyang brjod mi nus //
T02TD2455E:127a-51: rang rig skye ba med pa nyid //
T02TD2455E:127b-0: sangs rgyas @127b kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD2455E:127b-2: mchog tu dga' ba las byung dag / shin tu rnyed dka' go 'phang ni //
T02TD2455E:127b-3: bsam gyis mi khyab bla na med //
T02TD2455E:127b-4: mya ngan 'das gnas zhes bya ba //
T02TD2455E:127b-5: mngon par byang chub byed ba'o //
T02TD2455E:127b-6: bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin ni //
T02TD2455E:127b-7: nyin dang mtshan du bsgom pa yi //
T02TD2455E:127b-8: chos gcig gis ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2455E:127b-9: shin tu gus pas bsgom pa las //
T02TD2455E:127b-10: gzhan du de ni thob pa min //
T02TD2455E:127b-11: de ni rang bzhin dag ba ste //
T02TD2455E:127b-12: dus kun du ni 'dus ma byas //
T02TD2455E:127b-13: rtag dang chad pa rnam par spangs //
T02TD2455E:127b-14: thabs dang shes rab dri ma med //
T02TD2455E:127b-15: skye ba med par rtogs pa yis /
T02TD2455E:127b-16: sems can kun la yang dag gnas //
T02TD2455E:127b-17: sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab //
T02TD2455E:127b-18: bla na med par der shes bya //
T02TD2455E:127b-19: sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas de ni //
T02TD2455E:127b-20: sangs rgyas nyid ni thob byed pa'o //
T02TD2455E:127b-21: de ltar sems dang sems byung gi / don gyi rang bzhin rtogs nas ni //
T02TD2455E:127b-22: rdo rje dri med gsum sbyor ba //
T02TD2455E:127b-23: ji ste shes nas rnam bsgoms na //
T02TD2455E:127b-24: ye shes rdo rje rab sbyor gyis //
T02TD2455E:127b-26: dngos dang dngos med las 'das pas //
T02TD2455E:127b-27: nam mkha' lta bur khyab pa ste //
T02TD2455E:127b-28: dri med zhi ba thabs bcas par //
T02TD2455E:127b-29: brten par bya zhes 'dren pas brjod //
T02TD2455E:127b-30: thabs dang bral na khyod kyi min //
T02TD2455E:127b-31: thabs kyang khyod dang bral na min //
T02TD2455E:127b-32: de gnyis phan tshun bral ba yis //
T02TD2455E:127b-33: 'grub pa nam yang yod ma yin //
T02TD2455E:127b-34: thabs dang yang dag ldan pa ru //
T02TD2455E:127b-35: mdza' mo khyod ni ji bzhin 'gyur //
T02TD2455E:127b-36: bdag gis kun du shes zin na //
T02TD2455E:127b-37: de las gzhan pa ci smrar yod //
T02TD2455E:127b-38: bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin ni //
T02TD2455E:127b-39: bdag gi byang chub snying po'i bar //
T02TD2455E:127b-40: sangs rgyas nyid du brtan bgyid na //
T02TD2455E:127b-41: de bas bdag la drin gyis g-yogs //
T02TD2455E:127b-42: dpal ldan bde chen zhal snga nas //
T02TD2455E:127b-43: bdag ni sangs rgyas nyid bya'i rgyu //
T02TD2455E:127b-44: thabs dang yang dag ldan pa yi //
T02TD2455E:127b-45: blo gros chen mo khyod la ni //
T02TD2455E:127b-46: padma rdo rje nges par ni //
T02TD2455E:127b-47: sangs rgyas kyis zhes ji skad du //
T02TD2455E:127b-48: spring pa de bzhin grogs mo mchog / thabs dang bcas par bya dgos par //
T02TD2455E:127b-49: dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje can //
T02TD2455E:127b-50: de skad phrin brdzongs [?] de bzhin du //
T02TD2455E:127b-51: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyu nyid du //
T02TD2455E:127b-52: khyod kyis de ltar myur du gyis //
T02TD2455E:128a-2: phrin las skad cig myur du bskur //
T02TD2455E:128a-3: khyod kyis sbangs pa'am brjed ngas pa //
T02TD2455E:128a-4: bdag gis tshe 'dir gnas mi bya //
T02TD2455E:128a-5: bying dang rgod ba sbangs nas su //
T02TD2455E:128a-6: dus kun nyin dang mtshan du ni //
T02TD2455E:128a-7: rgyun du bar chad med pa ru //
T02TD2455E:128a-8: skad cig skad cig khyod dran pas //
T02TD2455E:128a-9: dngos grub don kun bdag la sbyin //
T02TD2455E:128a-10: gal te nge ltar ma gyur na //
T02TD2455E:128a-11: de tshe bdag ni smra bab pas //
T02TD2455E:128a-12: ji ltar byed pa ltos shig dang //
T02TD2455E:128a-13: ji bzhin rgyud kyi de nyid kyi //
T02TD2455E:128a-14: theg pa yis ni bcings nas su //
T02TD2455E:128a-15: yang dag pa yi khyim du ni //
T02TD2455E:128a-16: dge mas kun nas bcug nas ni //
T02TD2455E:128a-17: skye ba med par rtogs pa yi //
T02TD2455E:128a-18: sems dang sems byung rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2455E:128a-19: 'bad de srung ba byas nas su //
T02TD2455E:128a-20: de nyid sangs rgyas sa mchog tu //
T02TD2455E:128a-21: thabs kyi lcags sgrog gis bcings te //
T02TD2455E:128a-22: ye shes rdo rje'i gzer btab la //
T02TD2455E:128a-23: bdag med rdzong du bzhag nas ni //
T02TD2455E:128a-24: de nas bdag gis bsgrub par bya//
T02TD2455E:128a-25: de ltar khyod la spring bya ba //
T02TD2455E:128a-26: ji ltar gyur pa bdag gis springs //
T02TD2455E:128a-27: 'dzom dang do dga' spangs nas su //
T02TD2455E:128a-28: bzang mo la ni kun bzlas kyis //
T02TD2455E:128a-29: gal te byams par mi byed na //
T02TD2455E:128a-30: de tshe ci zhig smra ru yod //
T02TD2455E:128a-31: 'on te min na than 'di dag / rdo rje 'dzin ma'i snying la zhog / khyod kyi lam dang spyang ba yi //
T02TD2455E:128a-32: bye brag dag kyang ngas shes la //
T02TD2455E:128a-33: rigs dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang //
T02TD2455E:128a-34: bdag gis khyod kyi kun 'byung dang //
T02TD2455E:128a-35: don dam gnas kyang shes pas na //
T02TD2455E:128a-36: de bas bdag la blo gtod cig / bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis //
T02TD2455E:128a-37: thabs kyi mchog dang bcas pa ru //
T02TD2455E:128a-38: shes bya thag pa rab sra bas //
T02TD2455E:128a-39: de dang de ru rgyug byed pa //
T02TD2455E:128a-40: bdag gis bzung ste bcings zin pas //
T02TD2455E:128a-42: de bas lha mo bdag dga' bas //
T02TD2455E:128a-43: dbang gyur dam tshig la mnos la //
T02TD2455E:128a-44: dpal ldan bde chen zhal snga'i bka' //
T02TD2455E:128a-45: yon tan rgya mtshos bskyang bar gyis//
T02TD2455E:128a-46: khyod kyi rang bzhin gzung med cing //
T02TD2455E:128a-47: rmad byur ji bzhin rig nas ni //
T02TD2455E:128a-48: dpal ldan bde chen spyod pa ni //
T02TD2455E:128a-49: bka' yis de bzhin 'jug par bya //
T02TD2455E:128a-50: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig ldan pa //
T02TD2455E:128a-51: shes rab phrin yig mnyam med pa //
T02TD2455E:128a-52: dpal ldan bde chen zhal snga yi //
T02TD2455E:128b-0: bka' drin gyis ni bdag @128b gis byas //
T02TD2455E:128b-1: shes rab ri bo srub shing gis //
T02TD2455E:128b-2: shes bya'i'o mtsho bsrubs las byung //
T02TD2455E:128b-3: ye shes bdud rtsi rang byung ba //
T02TD2455E:128b-4: mngon sum sangs rgyas byed pa po //
T02TD2455E:128b-5: shes rab phrin yig la 'bad de //
T02TD2455E:128b-6: skyes bu gang gis de rig nas //
T02TD2455E:128b-7: 'bad de rnam par bsgoms pas na //
T02TD2455E:128b-9: shes rab kyi phrin yig slob dpon chen po padma rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2455E:128b-11: // / pandi ta chen po sh'anta bhadra dang /
T02TD2455E:128b-12: bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba 'gos lha btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba'o//
